languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, осторожнее — цвета сего ксеноса постоянно сменяют оттенки. Там, где была ясность, через миг оказывается тайна и тьма. Где было хорошее — прорастает дурное, а затем все перемешивается и встает с ног на голову. Нет сил на это смотреть, кружится голова..."

"Lord Captain, beware, the colours of this xenos are constantly changing. Where there was clarity one moment, there is mystery and darkness the next. Foulness sprouts where there was goodness and then everything is stirred up and turned upside down. I cannot bear to look at it. It is making me feel dizzy..."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, осторожнее — цвета сего ксеноса постоянно сменяют оттенки. Там, где была ясность, через миг оказывается тайна и тьма. Где было хорошее — прорастает дурное, а затем все перемешивается и встает с ног на голову. Нет сил на это смотреть, кружится голова..."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, prenez garde, les couleurs de ce xénos changent constamment. Là où l'on perçoit la clarté un instant, on découvre le mystère et la noirceur l'instant suivant. L'infamie grandit là où fleurissait la bonté, et soudain, tout est inversé. Je suis incapable de l'observer plus longtemps. J'ai la tête qui tourne... »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, beware, the colours of this xenos are constantly changing. Where there was clarity one moment, there is mystery and darkness the next. Foulness sprouts where there was goodness and then everything is stirred up and turned upside down. I cannot bear to look at it. It is making me feel dizzy..."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, prenez garde, les couleurs de ce xénos changent constamment. Là où l'on perçoit la clarté un instant, on découvre le mystère et la noirceur l'instant suivant. L'infamie grandit là où fleurissait la bonté, et soudain, tout est inversé. Je suis incapable de l'observer plus longtemps. J'ai la tête qui tourne... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “要当心，舰长大人。这个异形的颜色在不断变化，前一刻还清晰的地方，下一刻就变成了神秘和黑暗。丑恶在原本善良的地方生根发芽，随后一切都被搅得乱七八糟。我实在是看不下去了，这些颜色让我头晕目眩……”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, beware, the colours of this xenos are constantly changing. Where there was clarity one moment, there is mystery and darkness the next. Foulness sprouts where there was goodness and then everything is stirred up and turned upside down. I cannot bear to look at it. It is making me feel dizzy..."

traits.locale_text: “要当心，舰长大人。这个异形的颜色在不断变化，前一刻还清晰的地方，下一刻就变成了神秘和黑暗。丑恶在原本善良的地方生根发芽，随后一切都被搅得乱七八糟。我实在是看不下去了，这些颜色让我头晕目眩……”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、気を付けてください。この異種族の色は常に変化しています。ある瞬間には明瞭であったものが、次の瞬間には謎と闇に包まれている。善があったところに悪が芽生え、すべてがかき乱され、ひっくり返される。見るに耐えません。めまいがしそうです…」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, beware, the colours of this xenos are constantly changing. Where there was clarity one moment, there is mystery and darkness the next. Foulness sprouts where there was goodness and then everything is stirred up and turned upside down. I cannot bear to look at it. It is making me feel dizzy..."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、気を付けてください。この異種族の色は常に変化しています。ある瞬間には明瞭であったものが、次の瞬間には謎と闇に包まれている。善があったところに悪が芽生え、すべてがかき乱され、ひっくり返される。見るに耐えません。めまいがしそうです…」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Captain, hütet Euch, die Farben dieses Xenos verändern sich ständig. In einem Moment herrschte noch Klarheit, über dem nächsten liegt der Schleier des Mysteriums und der Dunkelheit. Wo das Gute war, breitet sich jetzt Fäulnis aus. Dann wird alles aufgewirbelt und auf den Kopf gestellt. Ich ertrage es nicht, es anzusehen. Es macht mich schwindelig ..."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, beware, the colours of this xenos are constantly changing. Where there was clarity one moment, there is mystery and darkness the next. Foulness sprouts where there was goodness and then everything is stirred up and turned upside down. I cannot bear to look at it. It is making me feel dizzy..."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, hütet Euch, die Farben dieses Xenos verändern sich ständig. In einem Moment herrschte noch Klarheit, über dem nächsten liegt der Schleier des Mysteriums und der Dunkelheit. Wo das Gute war, breitet sich jetzt Fäulnis aus. Dann wird alles aufgewirbelt und auf den Kopf gestellt. Ich ertrage es nicht, es anzusehen. Es macht mich schwindelig ..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Cuidado, Lord Capitán; los colores de este xenos están en constante cambio. Donde en un momento hay claridad, después veo misterio y luego oscuridad. Brota vileza de donde antes había bondad, y luego todo se mezcla y se pone del revés. No soporto mirarle, me está empezando a marear...».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, beware, the colours of this xenos are constantly changing. Where there was clarity one moment, there is mystery and darkness the next. Foulness sprouts where there was goodness and then everything is stirred up and turned upside down. I cannot bear to look at it. It is making me feel dizzy..."

traits.locale_text: «Cuidado, Lord Capitán; los colores de este xenos están en constante cambio. Donde en un momento hay claridad, después veo misterio y luego oscuridad. Brota vileza de donde antes había bondad, y luego todo se mezcla y se pone del revés. No soporto mirarle, me está empezando a marear...».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, dikkatli ol. Bu zenonun renkleri ikide bir değişiyor. Demin berrakken şimdi gizemli ve karanlığa bürünmüş hâldeler. İyiliğin durduğu yerden kötülük fışkırıyor, sonra her şey altüst olup tersine dönüyor. Bakmaya katlanamıyorum. Baktıkça başım dönüyor..."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, beware, the colours of this xenos are constantly changing. Where there was clarity one moment, there is mystery and darkness the next. Foulness sprouts where there was goodness and then everything is stirred up and turned upside down. I cannot bear to look at it. It is making me feel dizzy..."
